info.title: Creating the &productnameshort; virtual machine using Virt-manager

topic.para: to create a virtual machine using Virt-manager, proceed as follows:

step.para: Attach the configuration device to the host.
Click Create a new virtual machine
In the pop-up window, select Import existing disk image and proceed with Forward.
Select the raw disk image and fill in the operating system if not selected automatically. Proceed with Forward
Allocate the desired memory and CPU units to the virtual machine.

Fill in the name of the virtual machine and select networking type. Optionally, if you use the configuration device or you are deployng the encrypted image, check Customize configuration before install. Proceed with Finish.
With the encrypted image, perform the following configuration:
In Overview change Firmware to UEFI. Confirm the change by clicking Apply
If you prepared the configuration device, you need to add the device that is recognized by the virtual machine.
